attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recent attention about Dolly the sheep has highlightd ethical questions about reproductive technology. The petitioner is calling on the P.M. to explain to the nation, 

a) The purpose of cloning
b) The benefits
c) The cost 

Can the P.M. please outline UK govt policy in relation to transfer of animal assisted reproduction to humans ? If the benefits are in terms of disease management, then,

a) What diseases are being 
targeted ?
b) What are the likely advantages ?

If the benefits are in terms of vaccine development :
 
a) Which vaccines are being targeted 
b) What ethical committee approval has been gained to conduct these experiments ?

Can the P.M. please reassure the electorate that this is not science for science's sake ?!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
